mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.createrid AS "createrid", a.content AS "content", a.date AS "date", a.evaluation AS "evaluation", a.score AS "score", a.advice AS "advice", a.pm_id AS "employee.Id", a.student_id AS "studentId" si.studentid AS "infostudent" si.name AS "name"
LEFT JOIN student_info si ON si.studentid=a.student_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_lecture( id, createrid, content, date, evaluation, score, advice, pm_id, student_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createrid}, #{content}, #{date}, #{evaluation}, #{score}, #{advice}, #{employee.Id}, #{studentId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE student_lecture SET createrid = #{createrid}, content = #{content}, date = #{date}, evaluation = #{evaluation}, score = #{score}, advice = #{advice}, pm_id = #{employee.Id}, student_id = #{studentId} WHERE id = #{id}
